trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC804_01028_SEQ_00<tab>U'jughal needs a strong adventurer to eliminate the dread pirate Drysnagl.
TEXT_GAIUSC804_01028_SEQ_01<tab>U'jughal wants you to hunt down Dawson's impostor, Drysnagl. Slip into the Serpent's Tongue and hunt down the dread pirate.
TEXT_GAIUSC804_01028_SEQ_02<tab>You have delivered Drysnagl his comeuppance. Report the good news to U'jughal.
TEXT_GAIUSC804_01028_SEQ_03<tab>U'jughal breathes easier knowing there is one less Serpent Reaver to worry about.
TEXT_GAIUSC804_01028_TODO_00<tab>Slay Drysnagl in the Serpent's Tongue.

TEXT_GAIUSC804_01028_UJUGHAL_000_000<tab>Have to hand it to the villain Drysnagl─he's got gall. Most men wanted for sixty-four counts wouldn't dare leave the safety of the Serpent's Tongue. No doubt he's scurried back there by now.
TEXT_GAIUSC804_01028_UJUGHAL_000_001<tab>It's only a matter of time until the crystals end up in Sahagin hands and we're all drowning in Leviathan's wake.
TEXT_GAIUSC804_01028_UJUGHAL_000_002<tab>Drysnagl's a cutthroat among cutthroats─he wields his axe with sharp wits and crushing strength.
TEXT_GAIUSC804_01028_UJUGHAL_000_003<tab>Needless to say, seeking him out and rendering justice will be far from easy. The Navigator guide your blade!
TEXT_GAIUSC804_01028_UJUGHAL_000_020<tab>Ha! And here I feared I was sending you to your death! Glad you gave that rapscallion Drysnagl his comeuppance!
TEXT_GAIUSC804_01028_UJUGHAL_000_021<tab>A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who can dispense justice will always have a place by my side.
